page.title: 18KINGMOOR LOCAL POLITICS
page.content: {KINGMOOR LOCAL POLITICS Carlisle City Council have been quite busy lately building places like the Sands Leisure Centre & the Lanes Shopping Precinct.The Council are planning an ASDA shop to be built on the west central side of Carlisle.They have also tried to create lots more jobs.They have started building again around the Kingstown Industrial Estate. Carlisle's present MP is Ron Lewis who is in the Labour party.Mr Lewis has recently said that at the next general election he will retire. The seat will then be contested by Tory, Labour and Liberal/SDP Party candidates.
